mapred

Class JobScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • mapred.JobScheduler

  • public class JobScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to help the JobTracker to schedule the nodes for different functions. It contains 4 basic methods: 1) init() It is used to create some RMI connection; 2) selectBestNodeTochunk() It is used to select the best node for fetching the specific chunk; 3) selectBestNodesForReduce() It is used to select the best node for doing the reducer job; 4) chooseLightWorkLoadNode() It is used to select the lightest workload node.
    Author:
    menglonghe, sidilin

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init()
          throws java.io.IOException
        This is a method to initialize the class. It gets the ROR from the namenode.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • selectBestNodeToChunks

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String>> selectBestNodeToChunks(java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Integer,java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String>> chunkDistribution)
                                                                                                                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method is used to select the best node to execute the specific chunk of the input file. The rule is calculating the two selected nodes: local best node and global best node. We then using the programmer's setting of the local weight and global weight to decide the final node.
        Parameters:
        chunkDistribution - the chunks of the input file and their distribution list
        Returns:
        HashMap> which node to execute the chunk and where to fetch the chunk
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • chooseLightWorkloadNode

        public java.lang.String chooseLightWorkloadNode(java.util.HashSet<java.lang.String> nodes)
        This class is used to select the best node which has the lightest workload in a range of nodes.
        Parameters:
        nodes - the selected nodes including the local nodes and healthy global nodes.
        Returns:
        String the chosen node which represents by its IP address

      • pickBestNodesForReduce

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> pickBestNodesForReduce(int numOfReducers)
                                                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This classed is used to select the best nodes to execute the Reducer work. It just chooses the node with the most light workload and they are healthy.
        Parameters:
        numOfReducers - the number of partitions or reducers.
        Returns:
        ArrayList the select nodes
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
